Detailed Description

Utility class in charge of exchange server functions.

static bool Utilities.Exchange.Exchange.ArePeopleFree ( StringDictionary  People,
DateTime  StartTime,
DateTime  EndTime,
int  Interval,
string  UserName,
string  Password,
string  Server,
string  TimeZoneDifference 
) [static]

Checks if a person/group of people are free for a specified time.

Parameters:
People The people to check on
StartTime The start time
EndTime The end time
Interval The interval in minutes at which to check (the minimum is 10 minutes)
UserName The username of the person checking
Password The password of the person checking
Server Server name
TimeZoneDifference Time zone difference in hh:mm format
Returns:
return true if they are free, false otherwise

static byte [] Utilities.Exchange.Exchange.GetFreeBusyData ( StringDictionary  People,
DateTime  StartTime,
DateTime  EndTime,
int  Interval,
string  UserName,
string  Password,
string  Server,
string  TimeZoneDifference 
) [static]

Checks if a person/group of people are free for a specified time.

Parameters:
People The people to check on
StartTime The start time
EndTime The end time
Interval The interval in minutes at which to check (the minimum is 10 minutes)
UserName The username of the person checking
Password The password of the person checking
TimeZoneDifference Time zone difference
Server Server name
Returns:
returns an array of bytes stating whether someone is free or not, a 1 means they are not free during that time and a 0 means they are free

static DateTime Utilities.Exchange.Exchange.PickNextAvailableTime ( StringDictionary  People,
DateTime  StartTime,
DateTime  EndTime,
string  UserName,
string  Password,
string  Server,
string  TimeZoneDifference 
) [static]

Checks the users' calendars and picks the next available times for all of the users.

Parameters:
People People to check
StartTime Original start time
EndTime Originial end time
UserName User name
Password Password
Server Server name
TimeZoneDifference Time zone difference
Returns:
If a time is found, it returns the new start time. If it can't find an available time, it will return a date of 1/1/1900.

) [static]

Picks the next available time in the past based on a set of people's calendars.

Parameters:
People People to check on
StartTime Start time
EndTime End time
UserName User name
Password Password
Server Server name
TimeZoneDifference Time zone difference
Returns:
If a time is found, it returns the new start time. If it can't find an available time, it will return a date of 1/1/1900.
